body_html: Hi, I think the question is better to be asked on stackoverflow. You should use tf.minimize with your optimizer to create a train_op, and print lr_t after session.run(train_op) in each iteration.
body_text: Hi, I think the question is better to be asked on stackoverflow. You should use tf.minimize with your optimizer to create a train_op, and print lr_t after session.run(train_op) in each iteration.
body: Hi, I think the question is better to be asked on stackoverflow. You should use tf.minimize with your optimizer to create a train_op, and print lr_t after session.run(train_op) in each iteration.
